price: Then I seized those who disbelieved. How severe was My response!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
